description: Frontend Developer is significantly underutilized (20%) while Data Engineer is moderately loaded (68% peak)
mitigation_strategy: Assign 'Quality Champion' role to Frontend Dev to build automated test suite (DATA-007 assistance)
contingency_plan: Reduce Frontend allocation to 50% if cross-training fails
monitoring_trigger: Frontend dev reporting idle time > 1 day

description: Data Engineer is sole owner of ClickHouse/ETL infrastructure
